ov.authentication.name: ov.authentication
ov.authentication.description: Service to authenticate / logout or manipulate authenticated user informations.

ov.portal.name: ov.portal
ov.portal.description:
Main OpenVeo Portal module.

Initializes routes.

ov.name: ov
ov.description: Defines service to manage the video search.

ov.storage.name: ov.storage
ov.storage.description: Helper module to manipulate local storage.

authenticationService.name: authenticationService
authenticationService.description:
Defines an authentication service to deal with user authentication.
Exposes methods to deal with user information and to sign in or logout.

TranslateFilter.name: TranslateFilter
TranslateFilter.description:
Defines a filter to translate an id, contained inside a dictionary of translations,
into the appropriated text.

millisecondsToTime.name: millisecondsToTime
millisecondsToTime.description: Converts time in milliseconds into time string (hh:mm:ss).

applicationService.name: applicationService
applicationService.description: Defines service to manage the video search.

storageProvider.name: storageProvider
storageProvider.description:
Defines a storage provider to help store information.
For now sessionStorage and localStorage are supported.

classitems.description:
Defines an HTTP interceptor to handle all application errors.

Not authorized errors (401) logs out the user while the other HTTP errors set an error message
using an alert.
Defines the home page controller.

params.name: promotedVideos
params.description: Request results for promoted videos

Signs in using the login form information (login and password).

Navigates to administration interface (/be).

classitems.description:
Converts timestamp into Date.

If timestamp is actually a Date object, the Date object is returned without any conversion.

params.name: timestamp
params.description: Timestamp to transform into Date

return.description: The Date correponding to the given timestamp

classitems.description: Unserializes a value depending on the filter type.

params.name: filter
params.description: The filter corresponding to the specified value

params.name: value
params.description: The filter value

return.description: The unserialized value respecting the filter type

classitems.description: Serialiazes a value depending on a filter type.

params.name: filter
params.description: The filter corresponding to the specified value

params.name: value
params.description: The filter value

classitems.description: Serializes form values.

params.name: The
params.description: key / value pairs of form value to serialize

return.description: The list of serialized form values

classitems.description: Prepares form values to be used as query parameters.

params.name: formValues
params.description: The key / value pairs of form value

return.description: The list of form values formatted for query parameters

classitems.description: Builds search form model from given query parameters.

params.name: parameters
params.description: The key / value pairs of query parameters

classitems.description: Decodes all HTML entities and removes all HTML elements from specified text.

params.name: text
params.description: The text to sanitize

classitems.description:
Truncates videos texts (title and descriptions) depending on the viewport size.

If a query has been made using keywords it emphasis the query in the properties of the videos where it has been
found. The text containing the emphased keywords is also truncated around it.
If query is not found in the description the description is set to the leading paragraph.

params.name: videos
params.description: The list of videos with for each video: title, pois, rawLeadParagraph and rawDescription

return.description: The reference to the list of videos (not a copy)

classitems.description:
Emphasises the query in the given text and truncates around it.

All HTML tags in text are ignored, new lines are considered spaces and HTML entities are resolved.
Query is searched in the text in case insensitive manner.

Truncated result is prefixed and / or suffixed by ellipsis.

params.name: text
params.description: The text to emphasis and truncate

params.name: query
params.description: The word or group of words to look for

params.name: limit
params.description:
The maximum number of expected characters. Note that the ellipsis characters
count.

params.name: noEmphasis
params.description: true to truncate text without emphasing query

params.name: maxWordsBefore
params.description:
The number of words to keep before the emphasised text, if not set the
maximum is kept. Don't use it, it's only for internal use

params.name: maxWordsAfter
params.description:
The number of words to keep after the emphasised text, if not set the
maximum is kept. Don't use it, it's only for internal use

return.description: The emphasised / truncated text or null if query has not been found in the text

classitems.description: Prepares videos returned by the server to be used by the view.

params.name: rawVideos
params.description: The list of videos as returned by the server

return.description:
The list of videos with, for each video, its thumbnail, date and views, its title and
description with emphased keywords, its chapters and tags which match the query

classitems.description: Makes a search call to the server.
Gets a category name by its id.

params.name: id
params.description: The category id

classitems.name: getCategoryName

return.description: A promise resolving with the category name

classitems.description: Gets the list of promoted videos.
classitems.name: getPromotedVideos

return.description: A promise resolving with the list of promoted videos

classitems.description: Clears a search service cache.

params.name: type
params.description:
The cache element to clsear null to
clear all caches

params.description: The key of the element to remove
